title: If there is no data for series, it should display a friendly error message
description: When there is no data available for a series in the chart, a friendly error message should be displayed to inform the user.
OB: When there is no data available for a series in the chart, the preview does not display a friendly error message.
EB: When there is no data available for a series in the chart, a friendly error message should be displayed to inform the user.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a chart.
2. Set the data definition.
3. Select a column that does not have any data.
